rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Scandinavian aesthetics featuring minimalistic furniture, natural light and neutral color palette

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for open plan meal serving; integrates seamlessly into the living space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian style with functional cabinetry and clean lines. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances and ample storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring built-in wardrobes, large windows for natural light and Vastu aligned entrance from the south side

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom space with Scandinavian decor, ample storage and north-east facing window as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to promote calmness and light with natural elements and open design principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom for master bedroom; includes Vastu compliant fixtures and modern Scandinavian styling.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Compact guest toilet with minimalistic design ensuring privacy without occupying excessive space.
